Articles.Content:
I was playing around with rototrons to work with hinges and came up with this.

<iframe width="853" height="480" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/0om9kgRkfQE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Very impressive! Love the engine gimbaling to control the hover / landing.

Now I want to see it fold at 10,000m and unfold before it hits the ground.

I love mad scientists!

That would be perfect for sending to another planet.

Edited September 17, 2012 by Tommygun
Lolz, it looks a little silly but I can see it runs great! can we have the .craft file?
